$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/readme.text: This plugin adds the <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Choose/Caption}} button to the View Toolbar and also the {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} tab to the Sidebar. The button becomes <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}} when selected and then the tiddler appears in the list on the {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} tab. The list can be sorted using drag and drop. To drag an item, select it, then hold down the mouse or track-pad button while you drag it to a new location in the list. Release the button to drop the item into place. Unneeded favorites can be removed from the list by using the <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}} button in the tiddler. Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/favorites to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload. This plugin comprises: * Icon * Template * Stylesheet * Sidebar tab * Caption and hint
$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/readme.title: $:/plugins/ajh/favorites/readme
